Metadata.title: Zypp
Metadata.description: Zypp - Electric scooter rental service in Montpellier. 24/7 free-floating electric scooters for urban mobility.

Home.title: Welcome to Zypp
Home.subtitle: Electric mobility reimagined for Montpellier
Home.motto: Ride the future, one scooter at a time

hero.title: Electric Scooters for Montpellier
hero.subtitle: Available 24/7, no docking stations required
hero.description: Zypp brings sustainable urban mobility to Montpellier with our fleet of 1000 electric scooters. Simply unlock with your smartphone and ride anywhere in the city.

step1.title: Find & Unlock
step1.description: Locate a scooter near you using our app and unlock it with your smartphone

step2.title: Ride
step2.description: Enjoy your journey through Montpellier's streets

step3.title: Park & Lock
step3.description: Park in any designated zone and lock the scooter via the app

charging.title: Join our charging program
charging.description: Earn money by charging scooters at home
charging.benefits: Get paid for charging or enjoy discounted rides

Login.title: Sign In
Login.subtitle: Enter your credentials to access your account

Register.title: Create Account
Register.subtitle: Fill in your information to create a new account

personalInfo.title: Personal Information
personalInfo.description: Manage your account details and contact information

emergencyContact.title: Emergency Contact
emergencyContact.description: Contact information for emergencies during rides

paymentMethods.title: Payment Methods
paymentMethods.description: Manage your payment options for rides

preferences.title: Preferences
preferences.pushNotificationsDesc: Get notified about ride updates and promotions
preferences.emailNotificationsDesc: Receive receipts and important updates via email
preferences.locationServicesDesc: Help us find nearby scooters and track rides

accountActions.title: Account Actions
accountActions.description: Manage your account status and data
accountActions.deleteWarning: Account deletion is permanent and cannot be undone. All your data will be permanently removed from our systems.

UserApp.subtitle: Manage your Zypp account and rental history

help.title: Need Help?
help.description: Emergency contact or lost scooter? We're here to help 24/7

RentalHistory.title: Rental History
RentalHistory.description: View and search through your past rides

filters.searchPlaceholder: Search by location or scooter ID...

empty.title: No rides found
empty.noRides: Start your first ride to see your history here

export.title: Export History
export.description: Download your rental history for your records

RentalHistory.endOfHistory: You've reached the end of your rental history

Form.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
Form.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters
Form.nameTooShort: Name must be at least 2 characters
Form.phoneTooShort: Phone number must be at least 10 characters
Form.addressTooShort: Address must be at least 5 characters

PartnerProgram.title: Partner Program
PartnerProgram.subtitle: Manage your partner stations and earn revenue with Zypp

requiresInfo.title: Complete Your Profile
requiresInfo.description: To participate in the partner program, please complete your profile information including first name, last name, email, phone, and address.

stations.title: Your Partner Stations
stations.description: Manage your charging stations and view performance metrics

deleteStation.title: Delete Station
deleteStation.description: Are you sure you want to delete this station? This action cannot be undone.

empty.title: No stations found
empty.description: Start by adding your first partner station to begin earning revenue.

Messages.signupSuccess: Account created successfully! Please check your email to verify your account.
